item.description:
Bruins Pub Crawl
Saturday, November 8th @ 3:00pm

Our group will meet just outside of the North Station T station (orange line)
Venues included on the crawl:
Porters, Johnnie’s on the Side, DJ’s at the Garden, TD Banknorth Garden

YOU MUST BUY YOUR TICKETS IN ADVANCE
Please Choose option 1 OR 2 OR 3:
1) Crawl Only (Bruins tickets NOT included) ($25.00)
2) VIP ($55.00)
3) Premium ($65.00)

Event at a glance:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Anthem is excited to announce its next Bruins Pub Crawl! Come enjoy the game versus the Buffalo Sabres with some added fun provided by Anthem Entertainment. Mingle with former players (Anthem was pleased to have Bob Sweeney at the last crawl), and bar hop to three of Boston's best bars.
* Game tickets are included in OPTION 2 AND OPTION 3 ONLY - there will be no cover, no lines, and no waiting at any of the bars!

OPTION 2- Premium
One (1) game ticket: Bruins vs. Buffalo Sabres
Appetizers before & after the game
Three (3) complimentary raffle tickets
Four (4) drink tickets (2 @ Johnnie’s, 2 @ DJ’s)
Free admission to the post-game party
Free admission to bar of choice throughout the rest of the night
Line and other event privileges
Free admission to one (1) Anthem event of choice in November/December, 2008
First distribution of game tickets

OPTION 3 - VIP
One (1) game ticket: Bruins vs. Buffalo Sabres
Appetizers before & after the game
One (1) complimentary raffle ticket
Free admission to the post-game party
Free admission to bar of choice throughout the rest of the night

There will be awesome raffle/auction items as well with all proceeds benefiting The Boston Bruins Foundation and The Cam Neely House. All ages are welcome on the pub crawl prior to the game, but after the game it will be fun for 21+ patrons only!

Act fast as tickets for this pub crawl will only be available for a short time as this game will be a sell out! No tickets will be available at the event. The last crawl sold over 350 tickets.

For more information, or to order your tickets, check the website:
http://entertainment....
item.how_to_find_us: My now infamous Hartford Whaler's jersey - White with blue & green
item.name: Bruins Pub Crawl
